requirements.summary: Implement a responsive, multi-section marketing homepage with anchored navigation, interactive FAQ accordion, and footer link groups (original copy/layout inspired by reference).
acceptanceCriteria: Homepage renders all required sections in a clear order and resembles a modern crypto/product landing page structure similar to the reference site (without duplicating content).
Navigation allows jumping to page sections (anchor links) and works on mobile and desktop.
FAQ items expand/collapse with accessible keyboard interaction.
All sections are responsive and readable on common breakpoints (mobile/tablet/desktop).

file_operations.description: Create the single-page marketing layout containing: top navbar (desktop + mobile), hero with headline/subheadline + primary CTA, features/benefits, how-it-works, roadmap/timeline, FAQ accordion, and footer with link groups. Wire section anchor ids for in-page navigation and ensure responsive section spacing/typography with Tailwind. Use original English copy only.

Add a responsive navbar with section anchor links and a mobile disclosure/menu button; include a primary CTA button. Ensure keyboard-accessible navigation and focus states. (Do not copy reference branding/text.)

Implement an accessible accordion for the FAQ section (button + aria-expanded/aria-controls, roving focus or standard tabbing, enter/space toggles). Ensure multiple items can be opened/closed per intended behavior and that content is readable on mobile.
Create a roadmap/timeline section component styled as a modern product timeline (cards/steps) with responsive layout (stack on mobile, multi-column on larger screens).

Add reusable presentational section components for Hero, Features, HowItWorks, and Footer to keep App.tsx concise; ensure each section exposes a stable id for anchor navigation and uses Tailwind responsive utilities.

requirements.summary: Define and apply a cohesive warm dark visual theme (non-blue/purple primary) across typography, spacing, and component styles using Tailwind + CSS variables.
acceptanceCriteria: A consistent design system is evident across headings, buttons, cards, and section spacing.
Primary/secondary button styles are consistent across the page.
Theme uses a non-blue/purple primary color palette by default.

file_operations.description: Define the site theme using CSS variables consumed by Tailwind (background/foreground, card, border, primary/secondary, radius), selecting a warm non-blue/purple primary (e.g., amber/orange) suitable for a modern dark landing page. Include base typography defaults, smooth scrolling, and consistent focus ring styling.

Adjust/extend Tailwind theme tokens as needed to support the warm dark palette and consistent component styling (e.g., additional gradient/background utilities or semantic colors) while keeping primary non-blue/purple. Ensure content paths remain correct.
Apply the defined design system to navbar elements (button variants, link hover/focus states, mobile menu styling) to ensure consistency with the global theme.
Apply consistent section spacing, heading hierarchy, card styles, and button variants across hero/features/how-it-works/footer using the global theme tokens (Tailwind + CSS variables).

requirements.summary: Add required generated static images under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them in the homepage UI (logo, hero illustration, feature icons sprite, background pattern).
acceptanceCriteria: All required generated images exist at frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced by the UI.
Images are optimized for web display and scale appropriately across breakpoints.
No images are fetched from the reference site at runtime.

file_operations.description: Add the generated wordmark logo image asset at this exact path for use in the navbar and footer.
Add the generated hero illustration image asset at this exact path for use in the hero section.
Add the generated feature icon sprite at this exact path for use in the features section (6 icons in consistent line style).
Add the generated seamless background pattern image asset at this exact path for use as subtle section backgrounds on dark areas.
Reference frontend/public/assets/generated/brand-logo.dim_512x160.png in the navbar (and ensure it scales properly and has appropriate alt text).

Reference frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-illustration.dim_1400x900.png in the hero section; reference frontend/public/assets/generated/feature-icons-sprite.dim_1024x256.png in the features section; apply frontend/public/assets/generated/bg-pattern.dim_1600x1600.png as a subtle background where appropriate. Ensure responsive sizing and avoid fetching any external/reference-site images.
Ensure all image usage includes responsive dimensions (Tailwind) and appropriate loading behavior (e.g., avoid layout shift) while keeping assets local under frontend/public/assets/generated.
